title.narrative: Improving preschool education in line with the national “Starting Right Guidelines”

description.narrative: SDC is currently engaged in the restoration of permanent houses, community infrastructure and livelihood support, to facilitate the successful resettlement of conflict-displaced returnees in Northern Sri Lanka. Within the scope of infrastructure restoration, SDC supports the reconstruction of 25 preschools. This project will allow Terre des Hommes (Tdh) to ensure that 13 preschools, reconstructed with SDC support in the North, are functioning in line with the national “Starting Right Guidelines” for preschools. Preschool teachers will be adequately trained:, preschools will be equipped with appropriate furniture and developmental learning materials:, and measures will be taken to improve child protection by strengthening community based Early Childhood Development Committees. Tdh will work closely with national and district level authorities throughout the project.
